Package us.daveread.edu.graphics.surface

Class MainFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • us.daveread.edu.graphics.surface.MainFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
    public class MainFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Central service for supplying a frame that refreshes the objects placed on its panel.

    TODO triangle

      • getMaximizeVisibleSurfaceSize

        private java.awt.Dimension getMaximizeVisibleSurfaceSize()
